title: This Week's Top Stories - Oil Spil, Religious Exemptions for Vaccines & Meghan Trainor's Toilets
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Oil Spil, Religious Exemptions for Vaccines & Meghan Trainor's Toilets
description:
A huge oil spill occurs off the West Coast, Americans seek religious exemptions from vaccine mandates, and Meghan Trainor installs two toilets in her bathroom to use alongside her husband.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
